items.title: Bump pact-jvm-consumer-junit5_2.12 from 3.5.24 to 3.6.14
items.body:
Bumps [pact-jvm-consumer-junit5_2.12](https://github.com/DiUS/pact-jvm) from 3.5.24 to 3.6.14.
Release notes *Sourced from [pact-jvm-consumer-junit5_2.12's releases](https://github.com/DiUS/pact-jvm/releases).* > ## 3.6.14 > ## Bugfix Release > > * fix: use the charset from the content type when converting bodies to bytes [#941](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/DiUS/pact-jvm/issues/941) > * fix: remove all references to the mockserver on complete [#939](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/DiUS/pact-jvm/issues/939) > * fix: GET on pact-jvm-server root delivers broken json [#938](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/DiUS/pact-jvm/issues/938) > > ## 3.6.13 > ## Bugfixes > > * fix: mark the test result as failed if a state change callback fails [#930](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/DiUS/pact-jvm/issues/930) > * chore: only run the 200 mock server test on CI > * fix: from 3.6.3 header values are now a list [#928](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/DiUS/pact-jvm/issues/928) > > ## 3.6.12 > ## Bugfix Release > > * fix: preserve the scheme when adding preemptive auth [#902](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/DiUS/pact-jvm/issues/902) > * fix: allow the pact spec version to be specified at the class level (JUNIT 5) [#905](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/DiUS/pact-jvm/issues/905) > * chore: add readme notes about injecting values from provider states > > > ## 3.6.11 > ## Implemented Date and Time expressions with generators > > * feat: implemented Preemptive Authentication when accessing the pact broker [#902](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/DiUS/pact-jvm/issues/902) > * feat: enabled datetime expressions for generators > * feat: implemented time expressions for time generator > * feat: implemented date and time expression support in the Java 8 DSL > * chore: upgraded AWS S3 library to latest > * feat: implemented date and time expression support in the Java DSL > * feat: added support for date expressions to the groovy DSL > * fix: make sure JUnit tests execute the provider states in the correct order [#897](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/DiUS/pact-jvm/issues/897) > > ## 3.6.10 > ## Publishing failed test results > > * feat: compare XML child elements by tag and not index [#899](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/DiUS/pact-jvm/issues/899) > * feat: publish failed test results to the pact broker > > ## 3.6.1 > ## Bugfix Release > > * fix: correct the support for the old protocol on [@​PactBroker](https://github.com/PactBroker) > * feat: allow junit 5 consumer tests to inject the Pact model class [#830](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/DiUS/pact-jvm/issues/830) > * Feat: snapshot trimming on provider version ([@​aplsup](https://github.com/aplsup)) > * Fix: KotlinNullPointerException when a subset of headers don't match ([@​andreasf](https://github.com/andreasf)) > > ## 3.6.0-rc.1 > ## Second 3.6 RC > ... (truncated)

fix: GET on pact-jvm-server root delivers broken json [#938](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/DiUS/pact-jvm/issues/938) (Ronald Holshausen, Fri Sep 27 16:29:20 2019 +1000) > * 4ac4d12a - fix: blog post link in readme [#937](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/DiUS/pact-jvm/issues/937) (Ronald Holshausen, Mon Sep 9 18:56:01 2019 +1000) > * 3ec0debe - items.title: release-1.16-zh-init-files-fix
items.body:
# 本 PR 主要解决 en 与 zh 目录文档不一致问题

- 对中文翻译文档变更的文件重命名
- 移除翻译过时文档
- 获取新增加的文件列表 - add-issue
- 获取更新的文件列表 - update-issue
- 比较原始英文与翻译文档的差异

[翻译任务以此 PR 为基准创建](https://github.com/k8smeetup/website-tasks/issues)..

总计任务 Issue : 643
- 新增任务 issue: 353
- 更新任务 issue: 290 

去重文章 9 篇

- /docs/contribute/style/style-guide.md
- /docs/concepts/_index.md
- /docs/reference/setup-tools/kubeadm/kubeadm.md
- /docs/concepts/services-networking/service.md
- /docs/concepts/storage/volumes.md
- /docs/reference/kubectl/kubectl.md
- /docs/reference/setup-tools/kubeadm/kubeadm-config.md
- /docs/reference/setup-tools/kubeadm/kubeadm-join.md
- /docs/setup/_index.md

实际任务总计：643 - 9 = 634


> 已翻译过的文档，仍有大量的过时文件还需要修复..(还需时间比对确认..)


release-1.4 至 release-1.16 原始英文文档的变更如下：

执行命令：
```python
python3 scripts/diff_l10n_branches.py zh release-1.14 release-1.16 
```

